Summary: Had white top lighting and green bottom lighting.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Gulfport
There were no other sightings in Gulfport on or around July 20th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my back porch listeming to music, when all of a sudden, a bright lite appeared through the clouds. As it came closer, i started to see the really green lights that seemed to be under neath the white lite. It stood perfectly still,for more than 5-6 minutes. I tried to take a picture but my camera wouldnt pick it up. So i went out of the house to see if i couuld see it better, Then it slowly pulled away into nothing.
